short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A fun game of matching the clicks with the falling characters

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
An easy way to test your typing speed and the results will be available No of errors, accuracy in percentages, Words per Minute (WPM).

Version 1.2 : 11-May-2012 

1. New language added (French, German, Portuguese,Spanish) 

Version 1.1 : 16-Dec-2011 

1. Graphics & text matters are updated.

Version 1.0 : 12-Dec-2011 

1. Typing test app live in chrome store.
